description.value:
The effects of the smoke created by an alchemist's bomb duplicates the effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.im8z5kfg8ohowie9]{Cloudkill} instead of @Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{Fog Cloud}, filling an area equal to twice the bomb's splash radius for 1 round per level.

An alchemist must be at least 12th level and must possess the smoke bomb discovery before selecting this discovery.
